name: Unity Meteors RTX
description:
Be sure to watch my video for additional information and to see how the game was made!

Up or W for thrust in the direction you're facing.

Left/Right or A/D to rotate your ship.

Ctrl to fire or respawn (you automatically respawn after 5 seconds if you don't respawn manually before hand).

Esc to quit.

Music by Karl Casey @ White Bat Audio
